casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Michael Orlando COOK. No. 254P08-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 17, 2016. Michael Orlando Cook, Lumberton, for Cook, Michael Orlando. Derrick Mertz, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of NC. William R. West, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th of January 2016 by Defendant to Amend:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of March 2016."
